InstructionData.Title: SDB IC Chapter 2
InstructionData.Description: Next easy program for beginners interested in learning programming IC.â€‹
InstructionData.Author: Saddamo De Beers
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias NumberA r0 alias NumberB r1 alias NumberC r2 alias ColorNumber r10
alias DialA d0 alias DialB d1 alias DialC d2
alias LedA d3 alias LedB d4 alias LedC d5
start:
l NumberA DialA Setting l NumberB DialB Setting l ColorNumber d2 Setting
add NumberC NumberA NumberB
s LedA Setting NumberA s LedB Setting NumberB s LedC Setting NumberC
s LedC Color ColorNumber
yield
j start
